TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lwax_khu’, title = Lwax_khu’, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lwax_khu’} }

S.FORM: = Lwax khu' = Gaga mniq Sincuseyn Ufungsyang ka alang Lwax khu'. 44 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 80 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 39% niqan 31 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 61% niqan 49 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 34%, Saysiyat 4%. Tnhangan alang Alang Yung-san. Thyang alang Alang Yung-san ida bukuy spayis do niqan ka hangan nii da, dungus na bi o ririh saw gaga thngayan rulung ka dgiyaq, duri o yasa mniq Ta-ru-ling-daw tnxalan hiya, kika ngalan s-u tnxalan uri. Nniqan alang Sing-cu-seyn Wu-hong-sayng Alang Taw-san. Klbangan Sing-cu-seyng Wu-hong-syang Alang Taw-san 4 ling quri hiya tnalang, seejiq Atayal slawa dha "Lwax khu'", gaga mniq hhunac hraan hidaw yabi 5000 kncisan Alang Ulay. Kdkilan lnglingay Gaga mniq Ta-ru-ling-daw tnxalan hiya. Kndkilan lnglingay Mlutuc syusan Teyn-c Mniq alang seejiq Seejiq Ataya. Jilan kari Kari Atayal, kari Tlu, kari Khilang. Snhiyan utux Jidujyao. Pnyahan alang Ida murug "Gaya na Tayal"ni "Patas emnuda Kaw-sa-cu "na pntasan,kla mniq May-pa-lay-se"kika alang Sing-cu-seyn Wu-hong-sayng Cu-lin sayang ", bukuy do ini baka ka dxgal qpahan, iyux miing bgurah dxgal, tmhjil hini mniq da. klaan rrigan Teumal bnatas patas Kndusan Atayal: Thjil ni kkrana Alang: pnatas Lyaw-so-cen. Knlangan sing-wun cwan-ke sapah pyasan kwan-kwang ke. Hnkawas1984 . klabuy 152;319-323 Hangan dxgal Taywan ce-su-jung maxal spac: Sin-cu sayn. Lyuo-ming-yi dnii snalu. Tay-wan-seng wun-syeyn wey-yueyn-hwey. Hnkawas 2010. Klabuy 602.Patas emnuda Kaw-sa-cu: Endaan sbiyaw. Taywan cun-du-fu cing-wu-cuy li-hwan-ke pusu pnatas; Cung-yan-yayn-cyo-yueyn ming-cu-suey yayn-cyo-swo snalu tmhjil. Cung-yayn-yueyn ming-cu-swo. Hnkawas 2011. Klabuy 82-84.

= Lwax kho' = Gaga mniq Sincoseyn Ufongsyang ka alang Lwax kho'. 44 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 80 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 39% niqan 31 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 61% niqan 49 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 34%, Saysiyat 4%. Tnhangan alang Alang Yong-san. Thyang alang Alang Yong-san ida bokoy spayis do niqan ka hangan nii da, dongos na bi o ririh saw gaga thngayan rolong ka dgiyaq, dori o yasa mniq Ta-ro-ling-daw tnxalan hiya, kika ngalan s-o tnxalan ori. Nniqan alang Sing-co-seyn Wo-hong-sayng Alang Taw-san. Klbangan Sing-co-seyng Wo-hong-syang Alang Taw-san 4 ling qori hiya tnalang, seejiq Atayal slawa dha "Lwax kho'", gaga mniq hhonac hraan hidaw yabi 5000 kncisan Alang Ulay. Kdkilan lnglingay Gaga mniq Ta-ro-ling-daw tnxalan hiya. Kndkilan lnglingay Mlotoc syosan Teyn-c Mniq alang seejiq Seejiq Ataya. Jilan kari Kari Atayal, kari Tlo, kari Khilang. Snhiyan otox Jidojyao. Pnyahan alang Ida morog "Gaya na Tayal"ni "Patas emnoda Kaw-sa-co "na pntasan,kla mniq May-pa-lay-se"kika alang Sing-co-seyn Wo-hong-sayng Co-lin sayang ", bokoy do ini baka ka dxgal qpahan, iyox miing bgorah dxgal, tmhjil hini mniq da. klaan rrigan Teomal bnatas patas Kndosan Atayal: Thjil ni kkrana Alang: pnatas Lyaw-so-cen. Knlangan sing-won cwan-ke sapah pyasan kwan-kwang ke. Hnkawas1984 . klaboy 152;319-323 Hangan dxgal Taywan ce-so-jong maxal spac: Sin-co sayn. Lyoo-ming-yi dnii snalo. Tay-wan-seng won-syeyn wey-yoeyn-hwey. Hnkawas 2010. Klaboy 602.Patas emnoda Kaw-sa-co: Endaan sbiyaw. Taywan con-do-fo cing-wo-coy li-hwan-ke poso pnatas; Cong-yan-yayn-cyo-yoeyn ming-co-soey yayn-cyo-swo snalo tmhjil. Cong-yayn-yoeyn ming-co-swo. Hnkawas 2011. Klaboy 82-84.
